item.title: Prioritization of Value over Power
item.description: Power of Value Product-oriented companies exist and grow by generating value to their customers and they are especially good at prioritizing what to ship and where to invest their energy. They collect sufficient enough information to build, measure and learn to pivot their backlog of ideas or requirements. But one can not observe this in government investments or most of the large enterprise companies. For most of the cases in my country for example; government decisions made to achieve political goals or maintain the status quo, instead of generating more value to increase the overall prosperity of citizens.
